markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Sailor](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=439)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 88 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

You heard the call of the sea from a young age. Perhaps you signed onto a merchant’s vessel, joined the navy, or even fell in with a crew of pirates and scalawags.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength
or Dexterity, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) skill, and the [Sailing Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Underwater Marauder](/Feats.aspx?ID=858) skill feat.
name: Sailor

text: Sailor Source Player Core pg. 88 2.0 You heard the call of the sea from a young age. Perhaps you signed onto a merchant’s vessel, joined the navy, or even fell in with a crew of pirates and scalawags. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength or Dexterity, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Athletics skill, and the Sailing Lore skill. You gain the Underwater Marauder skill feat.
